title: I am here today (TEFC)
creator_contributor_role: Education Development Center (Newton, Mass.), production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Study and teaching

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Education of children
description: A record of how 21 children aged 5, 6 and 7 interacted with each other as they made various things in the playroom. The children were from the same class, growing and changing together in the classroom since the previous September. Filmed in May 1969. A film study for teachers.
